altText: Close-up shot of an AlphaTauri F1 car going around the Tosa corner at Imola in wet weather conditions
Close-up shot of a Mercedes F1 car going around turn 14 at Sakhir International Circuit in dry conditions
Zoomed-out shot of a Haas F1 car going around turns 5, 6, and 7 at the Circuit Of The Americas in dry conditions
Bird's eye view shot of an Aston Martin F1 car going around Brooklands and Luffield turns at the Silverstone Circuit in wet weather conditions
Zoomed-out shot of a McLaren F1 car going around turns 3 and 4 at Albert Park in dry conditions
Askew shot of an Alfa Romeo F1 car with a purple-lit block of flats in the background at a brightly lit Jeddah Corniche circuit in wet weather conditions
Zoomed-out shot of a Haas F1 car driving by the Hard Rock Stadium at the Miami International Autodrome in dry weather conditions
Askew shot of an Alpine F1 car on the start-finish straight at Circuit Barcelona Catalunya in dry weather conditions
Zoomed-out shot of a Ferrari F1 car driving around Rascasse around a well-lit Circuit de Monaco at midnight
Frog's eye view of a block of flats and an Alpine F1 car at the Baku Street Circuit in wet weather conditions
Zoomed-out shot of an Aston Martin F1 car going around U-turn 10 at Circuit Gilles Villeneuve in wet weather conditions
Red Bull F1 car exitting turns 7 and 8 at the Red Bull Ring in dry conditions
Bird's eye view of an AlphaTauri F1 car making its way through the final turn at Circuit Paul Ricard in dry conditions
Zoomed-out shot of an Alfa Romeo going around U-turn 13 at the Hungaroring circuit in dry conditions
Askew shot of a Ferrari F1 car approaching Eau Rouge at the Spa-Francorshamps Circuit in dry conditions
Askew shot of a Red Bull F1 car going around a banked U-turn with a ferris wheel and a filming crew's crane at the Zandvoort circuit in dry conditions
Close-up shot of a Ferrari F1 car with grandstands and a large Italian flag in the background at Autodromo Nazionale di Monza in dry conditions
Close-up shot of a Williams F1 with a massive ferris wheel in the background at the Marina Bay street circuit at midnight in dry conditions
Zoomed-out shot of an AlphaTauri F1 car going around the famous Suzuka esses in wet weather conditions
Haas F1 car driving next to a jumbotron showing the same car from the exact camera angle as in the photograph at Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez in wet weather conditions

Close-up shot of a Red Bull F1 car on the start-finish straight at the Yas Marina circuit at midnight in dry conditions
